website_summaries.verdict: One of the best slipper choices to look at for men who have larger feet.
pros: Footbed is contoured to provide a great deal of ergonomic support
Lining has moisture-wicking material to keep the feet dry
Easy to put on and take off using the single connection design of the supporting strap
cons: Larger slipper sizes can feel too large for a comfortable, tight fit

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay on your feet
customer_reviews.text: Hoped these would alleviate my plantar fasciitis, but they won't stay on my feet, just slide right off as soon as I try to walk. I have to ram my foot all the way through to where I can curl my toes over the front edge to try t get them to stay. Just not a good choice. No arch support, either - sole is dead flat like a flip-flop.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas F. Marks

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra expense, stop looking at cheaper options and just get these.
customer_reviews.text: Totally adjustable, nice thick footbed and soft uppers. If you have sensitive feet, go-ahead and get them, you won’t regret it. I went through a number of other, cheaper options before I finally just broke down and paid the extra money to get these and it was totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Rene

customer_reviews.title: Five stars!!! These Spa slippers are just what I needed.👍👍
customer_reviews.text: These mens gray spa slippers with built-in memory foam are the best pair of slippers that I've ever purchased from Amazon, infact they feel so good & comfortable on my feet when I wear them after stepping out of the shower. And for the most part these slippers are a perfect match for my Mansfield Spa bathroom robe, which I've also purchased from the same website. Now I agree with some of the people's comments about these particular slippers with them saying that they're not good for walking in, but other then that they sure feel great on my feet. Thanks Amazon.🙂
customer_reviews.author: Sparky Williams

customer_reviews.title: Memory foam Doesn't recover, BUUUUUT molds to feet!
customer_reviews.text: Bought anotger similar slipper returned for this.... Soo glad I did these are perfect for me. Only slight negative is the memory foam learns your foot and stays compressed.... No bounce back.. Adjusting width is set it and forget it... unless your feet swell then even more if a pro. I'd buy again for me or others as a gift!
customer_reviews.author: Yiorgo

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as my first pair
customer_reviews.text: This slipper has a thick sole which is wonderful for those of us who have problem feet. I also appreciate the velcro fastener so I can make the slipper fit my foot width better. This slipper is similar to the first slipper I bought like this, but the side part does not come back as far on the sole so the slipper holds tight to the foot and does not flop around as my first pair of this type. I wish Acorn had made their more recent slippers more like the original one.
customer_reviews.author: Ann D

customer_reviews.title: very cushie
customer_reviews.text: I love the cushion and support for my feet. I just wish the sizing was more accurate. I wear a 10 1/2 and I purchased the 9-10 and they are a little too small, but the 10-11 would have been way too big and I am 60 and was afraid it would cause me to trip. This is my second pair of Acorn slippers and the quality is outstanding as well as the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimee

customer_reviews.title: I thought I was getting a bargain but...
customer_reviews.text: Saw same exact pair on Zappo's except the price was ten dollars cheaper on Amazon. For sure I thought this was a great deal! Unfortunately I was very disappointed with the product. It was inferior and poor in quality. The local dollar store would probably carry something similar for just a few bucks. The "spa" slippers were not plush and they did not contour to my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cozy man-slippers! (helpful Q&A)
customer_reviews.text: I would have bought the wrong size if I hadn't read those customer questions & answers first - really helpful! My son wears 11.5 shoes & the XL 12-13 fit him perfectly. (the grey matched his bathrobe and he loves them!) Score!
customer_reviews.author: Phillipa Marlowe

customer_reviews.title: Not Terry, It's Fleece
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly comfortable, but the material is described as being terry (which, to me, implies some cotton content), but is actually fleece (i.e., 100% polyester), so even with the exposed toe and heel, my feet get too hot all along the sole and under the covered arch. Must return, alas.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Cause feet to roll onto outside edge of feet.
customer_reviews.text: Soles are thicker on the inside edge causing feet to roll onto outside edge of feet. Nicely made otherwise and prompt delivery. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Write

customer_reviews.title: Didn't fit the bill for me. Bought to try because Womens Spa Slide 1 not available anymore
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit at all and was hard on the foot. Not at all like Acorn usually feels. Usually soft & comfy now all I have received I have had to return because nothing feels like the Women's Spa Slide #1. Spa slide 2 is awful.
customer_reviews.author: Marwood

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just got my third pair of these slippers. My husband has a foot problem and I finally talked him into trying a pair. He said it is like walking on little pillows. He loves them! He crushed part of his foot when he was young and needs a wide shoe on one foot. The adjustable strap on these worked perfect
customer_reviews.author: Susan J.

customer_reviews.title: Avoid!! Straps have a seam!
customer_reviews.text: Fit is great, but they designed this with a seam around the straps that dug into my feet when I wore them around the house! Very disappointed in this latest update of the spa slide. The bottoms still feel great but couldn't handle the edge of the straps, not when the purpose was to be comfy!!
customer_reviews.author: Briggsadoon

customer_reviews.title: a mans slipper for a woman’s foot
customer_reviews.text: I can no longer wear the woman’s Acorn spa slipper because they changed the Velcro band to be much narrower and it no longer holds my foot in place. However, the men’s version of this slipper still has the wider band and works perfectly for me after I added industrial strength Velcro to the band so I could make it tighter. I wear a 9N and the men’s small fits.
customer_reviews.author: james d kulpa

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Oooh, soft on your feet as clouds of whipped cream! Perfect for anytime especially after shower. I bought a second pair to store for when the first pair ever wears out.
customer_reviews.author: qtpu2te

customer_reviews.title: Bummed these didn’t work out
customer_reviews.text: Comfort is great and the quality seems good, however these slide right off my feet when I walk. They feel tight when I strap them on but as soon as I start walking I practically walk right out of them. I know this could just be the way I walk but unfortunately I had to return them. My wife owns a pair of the woman’s version that goes between the toes and she absolutely loves them. Seems like a great brand but just didn’t work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Mason W

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Wow Acorn has gone downhill! I've been buying Acorn slippers for about 7 years now. This pair ripped in the seam after just 3 days! I returned them, and after reading reviews of others who had quality issues, decided on a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: FABRIC SLIPPERY
customer_reviews.text: I should have paid attention to the reviews. They were right. The fabric is too slippery and can't keep feet in them. Am afraid of falling when trying to walk. Disappointed as I have worn this style for many years and did not have that problem. Apparently they have changed manufacturers and fabric specification. Returning them.
customer_reviews.author: BernaK

customer_reviews.title: My hubs wears them!
customer_reviews.text: I reluctantly bought these after searching for open toed house slippers for my husband on Amazon. Kinda pricy for some slippers, but they looks pretty manly and quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: They aren't safe to walk in
customer_reviews.text: These look nice and cushy, and they are, but look at all that cushion in the photo. You don't sink straight down into the cushion. It pushes you from one side to the other making you feel unstable and off balance. Bizarre. Going up and down stairs felt dangerous. I could use these after I get out of the shower to wear from the bathroom to my bedroom, but that's it. They aren't safe to walk in otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Foot Pillows!!!! :)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my hubby as a gift since I use the women's ACORN thong spa slippers all of the time. He loves these for the same reason I love mine! They are super soft and comfortable. The rubber bottoms are great if you have to run to take the garbage out real quick. They are easy to get on, they are adjustable if you want to wear socks with them and they do not make your feet sweat. These slippers are squishy, comfy cozy and I will definitely purchase them again!
customer_reviews.author: Resa

customer_reviews.title: Acorn slippers are GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I've had Acorn slippers for the last 15 years. My old pair is still going strong but were starting to get a bit raggedy. When these arrived the footed was a bit stiff but they broke in & conformed to my foot nicely in no time. These are great out-of-the-shower/house slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Cee C

customer_reviews.title: Not enough stability
customer_reviews.text: I bought these slippers for my husband but they didn't work well for him. He turns one foot when he walks and the slippers don't have enough stability. He wants slippers with the open toes and it is difficult to find good ones for him.
customer_reviews.author: Nole Fan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy spa slides
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several pairs of these for my boyfriend. If you have hard floors like we do, you need something soft for your feet. He loves these. Just wears them until they fall apart. Nice adjustable upper strap for comfort and memory foam insole. I have them in a thong style for myself and cannot wait to put them on when I get home after work. Won't buy anything else. Perfect for the house.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W.

customer_reviews.title: Soft, comfy, and saves my feet
customer_reviews.text: My big ole flat feet are prone to plantar fasciitis, but no problems as long as I have my Acorns. They have enough cushion and great support. Opted for the men’s version when I couldn’t find a women’s size 11-12 in this style in black. Works great for me. I didn’t really have to break them in like some others said. I did slip a bit a couple times when making sidesteps but not since the first day.
customer_reviews.author: KayCee

customer_reviews.title: Repeat customer
customer_reviews.text: When on sale this exact Acorn Men’s Spa Slide, Black, are not too shabby. I always size up for sandals, and with these it works for indoor use, they are great for light use. 4 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Wannabee

customer_reviews.title: he said they are like walking on clouds
customer_reviews.text: My son-in-law loves these, he said they are like walking on clouds! He didn't want to take them off, and wore them to go out to pick up food. Great product, and lots of fun! Well-made, quality slipper, would highly recommend for a gift, or for yourself. The quotes on the bottom of the slipppers had us rolling on the floor -- hilarious!!
customer_reviews.author: DreamWeaver

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable but they're wearing out after a few weeks
customer_reviews.text: I really like these slippers but I've only had them a few weeks and my big toe has pulled the fabric away from the side. Also I ordered the X-Large because I have a broad foot but I'm really pushing the velcro to its limits. The size chart is confusing; it has 2 sets of sizes. I guess I should have ordered 13.5-14.5 since 12-13 (which apparently matches X-large) is not available. For the price I'd look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Daughtrey

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: When it came it looked fine, but after wearing it for a couple hours, the threads around the edge of the heel was falling apart exposing the foam inside the slipper.
customer_reviews.author: Stace

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: These are great. My whole house either has hardwood or tile floors so walking around made my feet soar. These remidied that problem. They fit just right and the open toe keeps my feet from sweating which is my issue with closed toe slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Feet slip in this even though the size is correct ...
customer_reviews.text: Feet slip in this even though the size is correct. If I put the velcro strap too tight then hard to slip in, if I put it just right then my feet slip. Ordering the womens thong slippers to see if they'll work. Feels comfy otherwise, but if I'm slipping I definitely can't wear
customer_reviews.author: Viktor

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, but be careful walking around.
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves these slippers, very comfy. But as others have noted, you can slip off the back of the shoe if not careful, so would not recommend for someone not steady on their feet. Personally, I don't care for house shoes that are this thick between the bottom of my foot and the floor, but hubby has a problem with his toe and needed the open toe and these do the trick for now. These are good quality, nicely made, worth the money, but would not have purchased this thick-sole style except for the open toe.
customer_reviews.author: Yellow Rose of Texas

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable slippers. However
customer_reviews.text: Extremely comfortable slippers. However, you need to be aware that because this doesn't provide arch support, if you have flat feet, suffer from plantar fasciitis, or are heavyset and you're shuffling around in these all day they will not provide the same kind of support that something like an orthopedic or a molded slipper would be to help with fatigue. Otherwise, very comfy, totally okay to wear them if you're just relaxing on the couch or don't suffer from any major orthopedic problems.
customer_reviews.author: Bernabe C.

customer_reviews.title: watch you dont fall off
customer_reviews.text: footbed is somewhat narrow and higher off the ground than what i call normal but also firm. a foot slip one way or another its a long way down
customer_reviews.author: tpa813

customer_reviews.title: cushion and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I bruised my heal. It was very painful to walk on and I needed in-house slippers with great cushion to protect it. These slippers are perfect! My wife wears the flip flop ACORN slippers and loves them also. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable slippers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband. He says they are really comfortable and he wears them a lot now! We love the Acorn brand slippers, so well made!
customer_reviews.author: AggieMom

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for the husband after buying a pair for myself earlier. He's not a big slippers guy (prefers flip flops) and thinks they look ridiculous. However, after convincing him to try it on b/c I promised they're the most comfortable slippers ever, he agreed and loves them now. He's been wearing them nonstop around the house since he got them.
customer_reviews.author: RageofMars

customer_reviews.title: Great Slippers....surprised fits so well
customer_reviews.text: Family loves these! If you are a man size 10, order the 9-10..fits perfectly. Adjustable, comfortable, and has a bit of arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is not durable. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: The slipper is comfortable but the fabric is thin. The fabric inside of the slipper tore within a 2 week period. I wanted a replacement but the site only had a return option and I didnt want to hassle with having to drive to a ups drop off store. You would think for the high price they wouldnt require one to go through the hassle of rerurning a damaged item. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Felix

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and good price!
customer_reviews.text: I wear them all the time in the house and even in the winter, my feet stay warm.
customer_reviews.author: BDL is MK

customer_reviews.title: Clouds!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable slippers I've ever owned. My wife has bought me a few pairs of random slippers over the years, but I always stopped wearing them after a short while for one reason or the other. They were either too hot, had cords around the sole that hurt to step on, weren't padded enough etc. These Acorn slides are da bomb! I refer to them as my "clouds", as that is what they really feel like walking on. Words cannot describe how comfortable these things are.
customer_reviews.author: Santa CruZin

customer_reviews.title: Lots of cushion!
customer_reviews.text: Just had foot surgery. The Acorn Spa slide has an adjustable width which is perfect for medical dressings and a super plush insole for added comfort. Just what the doctor ordered. Fourth foot surgery with second pair of Acorns. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cindi arnold

customer_reviews.title: the best slippers
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are easily the Best I have ever owned. I have a wide foot and slippers always feel tight and if I go up a size they don't stay on. These have an adjustable band with Velcro that you only need to adjust once and they stay. They are the first slippers I have ever owned that actually raise your feet up so you don't feel like your feet are touching the floor. After replacing slippers every few months trying to get a better more comfortable fit I have landed on the perfect pair. Excellent, soft & comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: abbaguy

customer_reviews.title: Sort of Unsafe
customer_reviews.text: I like these slippers but it has taken a while to get them broke in to where my heel doesn't slip off the slipper to the side. Numerous times I've almost tripped or twisted my ankle because of the slippery fabric with no indentation to keep the foot in place.
customer_reviews.author: MIchael G

customer_reviews.title: Great when I don't misplace them
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for classic dad old man slip ons. They're pretty good. All slippers are a little too warm for me.
customer_reviews.author: Just Some Dad

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but doesn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: This slipper is great at first, but the foam compresses quickly. I've also had one of the seams break. I'm not sure if I am particularly rough or if I god a bad pair, but for the price I would have expected more.
customer_reviews.author: Wade

customer_reviews.title: Sized Small
customer_reviews.text: Get a bigger size than you wear. These are little tiny slippers.
customer_reviews.author: CR

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy these
customer_reviews.text: These were purchased as a Christmas gift. They are junk! Don’t buy. I feel terrible that I gave them as s gift.
customer_reviews.author: marcia monteverde

customer_reviews.title: NO WALK SLIPPERS
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but not made for walking at all, the foot location needs to be cupped to keep your feet in the slipper they are flat so your feet slide out on every step
customer_reviews.author: Owen

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe for elderly!
customer_reviews.text: Strap support inadequate. Foot turns sideways and causes unbalance. Almost caused a fatality.
customer_reviews.author: APECS

customer_reviews.title: These are the best quality and most comfortable slippers out there
customer_reviews.text: Ok......I'm old! Also have old man's feet! These are the best quality and most comfortable slippers out there. This is my third pair in 10-12 years, and I wear them virtually all the time at home and ended up at CosCo one day in them. Hey, I'm old. Perfect if you have hardwood or tile floors. Machine washable when you forget and wear them out to CosCo. Buy em!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Dean

customer_reviews.title: Comfy 4/5
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely the width is adjustable it does have a sole just don't let it absorb water it will feels uncomfortable like socks in water.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: the right one fits like a glove
customer_reviews.text: some of the previous comments mentioned that the slippers keep sliding off. the right one fits like a glove, left one however...... for the world i can't find an adjustment that fits. oh well, wasted money and i will just use them as indoor shoes when i travel as they're very light.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny

customer_reviews.title: Good Feel, Narrow Heel
customer_reviews.text: They felt really nice, but the back was way too narrow.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Coming apart in 40 days
customer_reviews.text: Well I like the slipper, but after about 30 days I noticed a tear at a seam has already started. I’d give 5 stars if they lasted. I went to return and learned I just missed the 30-day windo by a week or so.
customer_reviews.author: momX4

customer_reviews.title: I HAVE ALWAYS LOVED THESE.
customer_reviews.text: SINCE I HAD ANKLE SURGERY, MY FEET ARE AND WILL ALWAYS BE SWOLLEN. SINCE THE WIDTH OF MY FEET ARE DIFFERENT, THE ADJUSTABILITY OF THESE ARE GREAT. I HAVE ANOTHER PAIR WHICH I HAVE PREADJUSTED TO WEAR WHEN I HAVE THICK SOCKS ON. ACORN IS A GREAT COMPANY WITH GREAT PRODUCTS. I JUST WISH THAT THEY MADE THEM IN 100% COTTON LIKE THEY USED TO SO I COULD WEAR THEM WITHOUT SOCKS SINCE I AM ALLERGIC TO SYNTHETIC MATERIALS.
customer_reviews.author: WOLFCHILD

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Lots of cushion and comfortable. I replace them when ever they where out and keep them on about 80% of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Catagnus

customer_reviews.title: Acorn Slippers
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these slippers.He has plantar fasciitis and these slippers gives him the arch support he needs for comfort.He has 2 pairs so he can wash one and let air dry for a couple of days and still have a pair to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Coy

customer_reviews.title: Slippery Slippers
customer_reviews.text: The sole and strap were soft enough, but my feet tended to slide off to the side of the slipper, making it difficult to avoid turning my ankle. The lack of a heel support allowed my foot to back out of the forward strap. overall I much prefer the enclosed slippers with sides and heel support, similar to ones I recently reviewed.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Unstable wobble.
customer_reviews.text: I previously had a similar, but different make of slipper slide. It had given me comfortable walking for a long time. These look similar, but are frequently unstable and make me feel as if I will twist my ankle. I keep adjusting the top flap hoping to correct this, but so far no luck. Perhaps, I should have purchased a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: Jjoek1

customer_reviews.title: Nice slipper
customer_reviews.text: Nice slipper, fit is as expected, fast shipping, I find that my eet slip off these shoes and that could make me fall or twist my ankle so I must be very careful while walking in these slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Griff

customer_reviews.title: Suuuuuuper soft
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy house slippers. Good non slip bottom. Wear them all day.
customer_reviews.author: A.Cooper

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly comfortable, but soles absorb water
customer_reviews.text: Style and comfort wise, these slippers are great. But the soles (which appear to be rubber but obviously aren't) absorb moisture, so if you wear them on a wet floor or deck, you might soon feel the water seeping through to your feet. It's like wearing sponges. The obvious ramifications of this for mildew and fungus developing prevent me from recommending them.
customer_reviews.author: vs

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, comfy
customer_reviews.text: I can't wear closed toe sandals without my feet sweating, so these adjustable foam slippers fit the bill. The foam seems to be holding up after a few months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Elder

customer_reviews.title: I'm now on my second pair and Love them. Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I had a previous pair of these and needed the extra cushion due to foot surgery. I'm now on my second pair and Love them. Very nice.
customer_reviews.author: woodridge

customer_reviews.title: these are about the most comfortable slippers I've ever found
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, these are about the most comfortable slippers I've ever found. They have a Rubber Sole so if you need to you can walk outside and do something. The company that makes these is on point. If you don't like him... you got problems
customer_reviews.author: BWAYNE

customer_reviews.title: Gift that did not like
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband thinking that open sandal would work for his hot feet. He would not even try them on. Stubborn man. But, I slipped them on and loved them! I sent them back but will be ordering more in my size. They are so soft and squishy yet supportive, grip bottom, and well made. They would be perfect for spa, pool, or gym.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen O

customer_reviews.title: Dad's
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my dad for upstairs in his bedroom to bathroom ventures! Easy on and off, comfortable and good support.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Soho

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable slipper with good padding
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable if you like an open toe because you find closed toe slippers too warm. It is roughly an inch thick so really good padding for a slipper. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gould

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: I love them...They came right on time... My doctor said I could not wear shoes so they are prefect!! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jordana Johnson

customer_reviews.title: I love the material and the padding
customer_reviews.text: I love the material and the padding. They just seemed a little small for my size 15 foot. My heel also seems to slide off at times when turning. Hopefully this will go away the more I wear them and they get broken in. But they are so soft and feel great on my feet.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SELLER
customer_reviews.text: The foam in these slippers dose not flatten out in two weeks. Very comfy. I have neurapathy in my feet. These are the only slippers that give me comfort.
customer_reviews.author: dcdjr123

customer_reviews.title: Too slippery for me
customer_reviews.text: Cushy feel, but the lack of friction causes my feet to slip off the sides of the sandals so it takes constant adjustment to walk in them. Wish I hadn't bought them. Your mileage may vary.
customer_reviews.author: FrankK

customer_reviews.title: I wish I had discovered these long ago!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! Cushioned sole is wonderful. I buy men's size because I have large wide feet. These are easy to slip on and they stay on while walking.
customer_reviews.author: S. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: I have wide feet so they are too narrow so I have to get a longer shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Russ

customer_reviews.title: Great spa slipper
customer_reviews.text: Great spa slipper. Very soft and comfortable. I use it as a indoor lounge shoes and so far happy with this. Definitely worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: whalemeal

customer_reviews.title: comfort
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, size is as close to right as it can get due to three toes missing on left foot. Provides needed cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wear them almost every day
customer_reviews.text: I love them, walk around the house in them cause I have hard wood floors, and I'll check my mail, take out the garbage, just enough padding under for going in the front yard.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: It's undersized for my size 11 feet
customer_reviews.text: However it's a comfortable slipper if it was a bit larger. I ordered the next size up and while rather large for me nevertheless are very comfortable. But you have to be careful as they are soft and offer no support left or right when moving. But the sole is thick and gentle on sore feet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Step into cushioned softness
customer_reviews.text: Plush material, very cushioned insole. Acorn makes the best slippers - I have used them for years.
customer_reviews.author: CONNIE BARRON

customer_reviews.title: Beware of extreme lack of stability
customer_reviews.text: I never leave reviews, and would not leave a negative review unless something's really wrong. These slippers are impossible to keep on one's feet. Even if I really tighten them, my feet are all over the place. I tried to walk up a ramp with a mild incline and literally couldn't keep them on my feet. If you need any stability whatsoever, do not buy these slippers. They would be quite comfortable in terms of texture if one could keep them on one's feet without sliding all over the place. I would only recommend them for people who are unable to stand up.
customer_reviews.author: gary mac smith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This are perfect around the house slippers. We have wood floors and these slippers are exactly what is needed to keep your feet neutral in temp and clean (without getting that slightest amount of dust on the bottom of your feet from wood floors, even if you clean them daily...).
customer_reviews.author: Keatgsr07

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable slippers
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd time I have ordered these. The only kind of slippers my husband will wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable house shoes I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: After several years of daily use they lose some of their springiness, and I usually wear out the soles. But I reorder them each time because they are so darn comfortable. They are the best I've found to reduce heel pain. I ordered two pair this time because I want to be sure to have them available for the next 4 - 5 years.
customer_reviews.author: Glynn in Plano

customer_reviews.title: Perfect slipper for me
customer_reviews.text: this is the second pair of these i have bought over the last 5 years. The first pair was still in good shape, but spilled some stuff on it that wouldn't really clean out well so just decided to buy a new pair. They are very soft and i like the easy slip on/off style and the open toe design. Makes it cooler (i live in TX) and easier to slip on when getting out of bed in the middle of the night (as opposed to having to make sure the back goes behind your heel).
customer_reviews.author: ravis22

customer_reviews.title: Good variable fit
customer_reviews.text: I took off a star because the pair are a bit lint-y, but a small brush took off the excess. My husband's feet had swollen and these have enough room to fit him.
customer_reviews.author: KAJAK

customer_reviews.title: Walk carefully for short periods of time and these are fine.
customer_reviews.text: While it's very fluffy & comfy, it doesn't provide any arch support & it's very easy to twist off of the edge of the comfy, thick sole. Walk carefully for short periods of time and these are fine.
customer_reviews.author: DeanO

customer_reviews.title: Man who does not care for slippers loves this one
customer_reviews.text: I am a man that is not fond of slippers...wife bought for me (she has 2 pairs of woman model) and upon using once, i now walk in them in house instead of barefoot due to walking on air comfort and helps feet not dry out (cracking as mens feet >50 years old tend to do). i will buy another pair in a few months and then use older ones in garage and when walking out to mailbox.
customer_reviews.author: Lisatag

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: These feel great and my feet don't sweat as they do in normal slippers. They aren't the most flattering things to wear on your feet, but for lounging around the house away from judging eyes, they're perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Clifton

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good slipper.
customer_reviews.text: Nice slipper. As some other people have mentioned, they do fall off unless you wear socks. Comfy
customer_reviews.author: AndrewBsupafly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Somehow the tan fit better then the pink. Thank you for having them.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Size 13 AAA is always hard to find a fit.
customer_reviews.text: I got these because my boyfriend's feet are always cold, but he does not want to wear slippers that make his feet sweat. These were perfect. Fit: These slippers fit well, lengthwise, but are too wide and the velcro strap will only adjust so far. But, a little judicious sewing of additional velcro fixed it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Mottram

customer_reviews.title: ) They're so comfortable and the material it's made it out of doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband and he loves them! I do too...which is why I keep stealing them from him : ) They're so comfortable and the material it's made it out of doesn't "flatten" as much after a few uses like other slippers tend to. Very good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: G. V.

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable and Cushy
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and cushy. I love the adjustable strap. My feet can swell, and these slippers work well for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ari's Poppy

customer_reviews.title: warm even though open
customer_reviews.text: These are so cozy and cushy. I haven't worn them much over the summer because they are warm and it's hot here. I'll be wearing them much more in the autumn and winter.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory G.

customer_reviews.title: True to size and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These slippers actually fit true to size, which was not true for 2 or 3 others I ordered for my husband before I got these. My husband loves them and says they are very comfortable. The footbed is very soft and cushioning. We are very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time buying these for my husband. After three years of wear and tear on the first pair he was quite disappointed when he literally wore them out, but he was overjoyed when he received his new pair.
customer_reviews.author: B. Boop

customer_reviews.title: Wonderously awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and well assembled. Squishy footbed is soft and the velcro clasp over the top can be adjusted to barefoot or socked feet. I love it, but would be nice to have a little elastic band so the strap can remain static.
customer_reviews.author: drew_san

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable slipper
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, but sometimes they tend to slip off of foot.
customer_reviews.author: Nanncy

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers !
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband after his surgery. His feet were swollen due to them poisoning him and nearly shutting his kidneys down. That's a whole other story. He couldn't wear his shoes. These were perfect. Soft and comfortable !! Thank you seller.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Taylor

product_meta.title: Acorn Men's Spa Slide
product_meta.description:
Indulge in these Men's Acorn Spa Slide Slippers. The soft spa terry upper and lining wrap your feet in comfort after those long work days. An adjustable arch strap ensures you never have to worry about a secure fit. Acorn's Cloud Cushion memory foam footbed is designed with multiple layers of high density foam and an EVA foundation that helps keep layers plump and resiliant. The non-slip, weatherproof sole is perfect for indoor and outdoor wear. Take your relaxation to the next level with the ultimate après-anything slipper.

Over the years, Acorn has designed and innovated to create the comfort classics America has grown to love. Today an expanded product line including Classic Comfort, Studio Comfort, Spa Comfort, and After Active provides customers with a lifestyle collection that fits their needs. Acorn has searched the world to provide footwear for today's lifestyle-- you can count on Acorn to still live by their commitment to provide Comfort on Earth one pair of feet at a time.
feature_bullets: Classic spa slipper- Super soft plush terry house shoe in adjustable classic open-toe slide design for all-year wear comfort; Skid-resistant; weatherproof rugged sole provides indoor & outdoor versatility.

Memory foam comfort: Flexible multilayer Cloud Cushion insole memory foam foot bed for support that cradles the contour of your foot for a therapeutic fit. Helps alleviate sore and tired feet and foot pain associated with Plantar Fasciitis; Flatfoot; Talipes Valgus; and Splayfoot.
Versatile- All season slipper with skid-resistant; durable and lightweight sole. Easily portable; great for spa; yoga; home; office; school; hospital; travel; indoors; outdoor.

Size and easy care: This slipper runs small; we recommend ordering the next size up for the most comfortable and flexible fit. Available sizes Small (7.5-8.5); Medium (9-10); Large (10.5-11.5); X-Large (12-13); XX-Large (14-15). Care: Machine wash cool water; dry flat away from heat Care: Machine wash cold; air dry.

Slip on comfort- Slide on style with comfortable and breathable support with Marshmallow-like cushion for tired toes and heels; helps reduces muscle fatigue and relieves pain and pressure. Adjustable and contouring fit is comfortable for diabetic patients and pregnant women suffering from swollen feet.
